ivardefs.name: account_
ivardefs.desc: The set of accounts that may be used for billing for this EpisodeOfCare.

ivardefs.name: careManager
ivardefs.desc: The practitioner that is the care manager/care co-ordinator for this patient.

ivardefs.name: diagnosis_
ivardefs.desc: The list of diagnosis relevant to this episode of care.

ivardefs.name: identifier_
ivardefs.desc: The EpisodeOfCare may be known by different identifiers for different contexts of use, such as when an external agency is tracking the Episode for funding purposes.

ivardefs.name: managingOrganization
ivardefs.desc: The organization that has assumed the specific responsibilities for the specified duration.

ivardefs.name: patient
ivardefs.desc: The patient who is the focus of this episode of care.

ivardefs.name: period
ivardefs.desc: The interval during which the managing organization assumes the defined responsibility.

ivardefs.name: referralRequest_
ivardefs.desc: Referral Request(s) that are fulfilled by this EpisodeOfCare, incoming referrals.

ivardefs.name: status
ivardefs.desc: planned | waitlist | active | onhold | finished | cancelled.

ivardefs.name: statusHistory_
ivardefs.desc: The history of statuses that the EpisodeOfCare has been through (without requiring processing the history of the resource).

ivardefs.name: team_
ivardefs.desc: The list of practitioners that may be facilitating this episode of care for specific purposes.

ivardefs.name: type_
ivardefs.desc: A classification of the type of episode of care; e.g. specialist referral, disease management, type of funded care.
